name: codesandboxer-repo
description: A simple react component to help easily deploy an example to codesandbox

scripts.build: bolt ws exec -- babel src -d dist --ignore  **/*.test.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn test && yarn flow && yarn build
scripts.dev:csb: bolt w codesandboxer exec -- babel src -d dist --ignore  **/*.test.js --watch
scripts.version:csb: bolt w codesandboxer exec -- npm version
scripts.dev:rcsb: bolt w react-codesandboxer exec -- babel src -d dist --ignore  **/*.test.js --watch
scripts.version:rcsb: bolt w react-codesandboxer exec -- npm version

author: Ben Conolly
